fruits.name: Lemon Meringue
fruits.description: A creamy, tart mango with a smooth texture. Great for desserts.

fruits.name: Carrie
fruits.description: Carrie mangoes are known for their robust, sweet, and aromatic flavor, often compared to Indian Alphonso mangoes. They are described as having a creamy, juicy, and fiberless texture. Some people also detect subtle coconut or bubblegum notes. The flesh is typically a yellow-orange color and is considered a dessert mango, appreciated for its strong aroma and sweet flavor.
